testsuite.name: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: Then The Privacy Policy Required is false
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: When I set the Privacy Policy URL to "http://www.example.com/some_page"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: And The Privacy Policy URL is "http://www.example.com/some_page"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: Then The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: And The Privacy Policy URL is "//www.example.com/some_page"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: When I set the Privacy Policy URL to "thisisnotavalidurl"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: Then The following System Settings error is visible: Invalid Privacy Policy URL
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: When I set Privacy Policy Required to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the validation of Privacy Policy URL on System Settings page.
